resources.string: Please check that you\'ve entered both origin and destination.
Displays a notificaiton while bus arrival monitoring is active
Displays a notificaiton when the arrival timing set is reached
We couldn\'t connect to NUS servers. Please try again later.
Find out the nearest bus stop to you, and when buses are arriving at each stop! You can also find out first/last bus info for each service.
Get notified when the bus you want to take is arriving! Tap the 3 dots next to any bus stop to select services to monitor, and the timing to trigger the notification.
Need to get somewhere within campus? Find your way between buildings within NUS! You can filter your search by sheltered routes, accessible routes, or walking-only routes too!
Save your most-used bus stops and services to your Favourites list, and get instant access from the Home tab!
Know if any bus service is disrupted, and make changes to your travel plans instantly!
Find information on a specific bus service, including first/last bus timings!
Note: Data used in the app is retrieved real-time from NUS servers. We\'re unable to guarantee the accuracy of the data provided.
